content.html: Nope, for me it's the religious crusader vibe. Someone also suggested "crusader" to me once in a similar context. I had to point out that crusade is the literal translation of jihad to help them see how badly that translates outside of predominantly Christian communities.
content.value:
Nope, for me it's the religious crusader vibe.

Someone also suggested "crusader" to me once in a similar context. I had to point out that crusade is the literal translation of jihad to help them see how badly that translates outside of predominantly Christian communities.
